cluster_relations.rel_desc: Natural pest control by birds helps prevent outbreaks of pests.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Subject contributes to reducing the likelihood or occurrence of the object event or state, without guaranteeing complete prevention.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: By preventing pest outbreaks, birds indirectly protect crops from damage.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Subject contributes to protecting the object from harm or damage, either directly or indirectly (e.g., via trophic or ecological pathways).

qualifiers.OtherQualifier: Pathway: via reduction of pest outbreaks

remarks: Relation added to capture the implied protective service to crops.
